Html:
Hello

Here is my code
Thanks for any help

      GMapCommunes = new GMapOverlay(_MainMap, "Communes");

      List<PointLatLng> lpo = new List<PointLatLng>();
      lpo.Add(new PointLatLng(50.07,4.23));
      lpo.Add(new PointLatLng(50.19, 4.21));
      lpo.Add(new PointLatLng(50.18, 4.45));
      lpo.Add(new PointLatLng(49.80, 4.45));
      lpo.Add(new PointLatLng(50.07, 4.23));
      GMapPolygon P = new GMapPolygon(lpo, "AnyCommune");
      P.Stroke = new Pen(Color.Red, 4);
      P.Fill = Brushes.Yellow;
      P.IsVisible = true;
      GMapCommunes.Polygons.Add(P);

      lpo = new List<PointLatLng>();
      lpo.Add(new PointLatLng(50.93, 3.38));
      lpo.Add(new PointLatLng(50.85, 3.38));
      lpo.Add(new PointLatLng(50.85, 3.51));
      lpo.Add(new PointLatLng(50.93, 3.51));
      lpo.Add(new PointLatLng(50.93, 3.38));
      P = new GMapPolygon(lpo, "Wa");
      P.Stroke = new Pen(Color.Red, 4);
      P.Fill = Brushes.Yellow;
      P.IsVisible = true;
     
      GMapCommunes.Polygons.Add(P);
      GMapCommunes.IsVisibile = true

_MainMap.Overlays.Add(GMapCommunes);;

      _MainMap.PolygonsEnabled = true;

2- Forget to add the layer to the Map
